name: FORCE OF NATURE
detail:
KZAとDJ KENTは「FORCE OF NATURE」としてハウスやヒップホップを中心とした音楽性のインストゥルメンタルユニットで活動を始め、マイクアキラはソロ活動に転向する。

Force of Nature are KZA and DJ Kent, two long time friends that share the same musical tastes and vision. KZA is a huge vinyl junkie who has acquired an enormous record collection over the years, enabling him to have a wide variety music at his fingertips. DJ Kent, the other side, has been dj'ing in Japan for many years now and has developed his own unique sound and musical style that makes him one of the most stimuluating and respected DJ's in the Japanese dance music scene.
